Text: Really the best game i ever played

Oh I forgot to mention that you *may* need to run the game as administrator on Windows Vista/7. I have Win XP x64 and I didn't need to do that, so that's why I forgot to mention it. I'm not sure it's required though.
yes the best one indeed

I should trying running the ps2 version off an emulator, because the PC really had no legitimate, functional gamepad support. It is a good game, but I cannot come anywhere close to playing it effectively with a mouse and a keyboard. They are people who can, obviously, but I'm certainly not the only gamepad only player out there.
I meant to say that the PC version of Indigo Prophecy has no effective gamepad support. Not even Pinnacle Profiler, unless you know how to create a pin yourself.
just one question: is it patched ?

Yes, 1.1 patch is included.
